CN.content:
Please identify the "Material Name" entities in the following paragraph.

Paragraph: 26 The LUMO energy levels of the polymers were determined by combining the HOMO energy levels obtained from CV and the optical bandgap energies obtained from the edges of absorption.

Let's think step by step.

In the given paragraph, the following are the "Material Name" entities:

1. Polymers
2. HOMO (Highest Occupied Molecular Orbital)
3. LUMO (Lowest Unoccupied Molecular Orbital)
4. CV (Cyclic Voltammetry)
5. absorption edges (referring to the absorption spectra of the polymers)
Please remove irrelevant entities and only keep the entities that clearly refer to Material Name.

Sure! Here are the relevant entities in the paragraph that refer to "Material Name":

1. Polymers
2. LUMO (Lowest Unoccupied Molecular Orbital)

These are the only entities in the paragraph that refer directly to the term "Material Name".

Please present the valid entities as a Markdown table with one column "Material Name".

Make sure to present the entities precisely in the same words as in the original paragraph.

Certainly! Here are the valid entities in the paragraph that refer to "Material Name", presented in a Markdown table with one column titled "Material Name":

| Material Name |
| --- |
| Polymers |
| LUMO (Lowest Unoccupied Molecular Orbital) |

I hope this helps! Let me know if you have any further questions.
